Razor Claw Transformed to raptor mode catapulting him over Ice's 
head. (If you know how Dinobot transforms you'll understand how that 
maneuver would work.) He spun around lashing his tail at the polar 
bear. his head flashed past Foxfingers hiding place snapping his 
teeth in a taunting manner.

Foxfingers ducked his head all the way under the science station 
where he hid. "Please don't eat me?" he pleaded in complete horror as 
the teeth snapped.

Lunarpine stepped a little closer ready to intervene at any moment.

Veratis called to Foxfingers trying to get him away from 
danger. "You're a thief, remember, you can get out of any dead end." 
If Foxfingers stayed in shock someone would have to go get him.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> Ice::
> 
> She felt his knee hit her lower jaw. Her head lifted slightly from 
> the impact. She roared and bit down on his shoulder. Sinking her 
> large teeth into his flesh. Her hind legs bracing her, trying to 
hold 
> him against the wall. She didn't want to kill this bot, but she was 
> more of a recon bot. She was now physicaly able to fight, but 
> mentally, she wasn't as prepared. She was going on instinct. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > The sword pulled Razor Claw off balance but he did not let 
> go. "What 
> > demonic force is this?" He was paying attention to the sword when 
> Ice 
> > forced him into the wall. He dropped his sword upon impact. 
Pinned 
> > against the wall he threw his knee up trying to catch her in the 
> jaw.
> > 
> > Lunarpine stepped forward grabbing the sword and tossed it aside 
so 
> > Razor Claw wouldn't be able to recover it. "Hit him again Ice." 
He 
> > was really getting into watching the fight but he still wished he 
> was 
> > in there instead of her.
> > 
> > Veratis played the part of a typical scientist taking notes as 
the 
> > fight went on. He wanted to see what she was capable of in a 
fight, 
> > he was deffinitely getting his moneys worth and then some.
> >
